channel.title: Adding hidden
channel.description: OK I want to add a ranking that makes a player hidden but I already have playerRights = 4 set to be donator, so I a trying to make it be playerRights = 5. this is what I have.. this is in playerSave.java [code]} else if (token.equals("isHidden")) { p.isHidden = Integer.parseInt(token2);[/code] [code] characterfile.write("isHidden = ", 0, 12); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.isHidden), 0, Integer.toString(p.isHidden).length()); characterfile.newLine();[/code] and this is in MadTurnipConnection.java [code]else if(prod == 29 && price == 20){ c.playerRights = 5; c.isHidden = 1; b = true;[/code] and this is in player.java [code] isDonator, isHidden, WildTimer = 0, magePoints = 0, desertTreasure = 0, lastArrowUsed = -1,[/code] i get no errors when I compile but when A player loggs out my cmd box explodes, as shown in the pic.. [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/15n22is.jpg[/img]

item.title: Adding hidden
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

OK I want to add a ranking that makes a player hidden but I already have playerRights = 4 set to be donator, so I a trying to make it be playerRights = 5.
this is what I have…
this is in playerSave.java

} else if (token.equals("isHidden")) { p.isHidden = Integer.parseInt(token2);

characterfile.write("isHidden = ", 0, 12); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.isHidden), 0, Integer.toString(p.isHidden).length()); characterfile.newLine();
and this is in MadTurnipConnection.java

else if(prod == 29 && price == 20){ c.playerRights = 5; c.isHidden = 1; b = true;
and this is in player.java

isDonator, isHidden, WildTimer = 0, magePoints = 0, desertTreasure = 0, lastArrowUsed = -1,
i get no errors when I compile but when A player loggs out my cmd box explodes, as shown in the pic…

Read full topic
